At this ponit, as the =
first stasis pod opened up in front of the approaching HYDRAS, there was a =
shffting sound as the pod opened, gas escaping.

OVer was a figure that loo=
ked familiar, yet not so, and yet was instantly identifiable.

A bodyform t=
hat would look familiar, that of Megatron's first transmetal form, but of a=
 darker coloration.

There spoke DINOBOT, "It was said, beware of Greeks be=
aring gifts."

DINOBOT glancing over at HYDRAS as he rose up and stood high=
.  "And I bow before you in service, LORD HYDRAS."  The Transmetalized, clo=
ned DINOBOT once again locked in the service of the one he had betrayed.

he other one was a familiar figure, perhaps one recognizable or not. That o=
f an old lieutenant and subcommander.  VICE GRIP.

nd out of the tank, glancing over at HYDRAS, and his first words were, "Wha=
t..  Have you done with Lord Megatron?"
